arts.ttl: Wrexham star James McClean targeted by angry fan as police intervene during controversial clash
arts.sum: James McClean was at the centre of a controversial 1-0 win for Wrexham, who beat League One rivals Stockport County on Saturday to boost their hopes of securing automatic promotion to the Championship

arts.ttl: Wrexham boost promotion hopes with 1-0 win
arts.sum: Wrexham made progress in their hunt for automatic promotion from League One on Saturday as they moved into second place with a 1-0 win over 10-man Stockport County.

arts.ttl: Jay Rodriguez on target as Wrexham beat promotion rivals Stockport
arts.sum: The former Premier League striker followed up to score after his penalty was saved.

arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds told to fork out for sake of Wrexham stars as another complaint lodged
arts.sum: Wrexham have been without a permanent training facility for almost nine years and concerns have been raised about the lack of investment in a new base

arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds told to put hands in pocket after complaints and Wrexham's £2m-plus spending
arts.sum: Wrexham's Hollywood owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney have been told a new permanent training base is urgently needed for their star players to keep progressing
